channel.title: Black Mesa crashes after lauching
channel.description: When i lauches a game, it crashes. Please note: i updated DirectX, Visual C++ 2010/13 and Nivdia Drivers. D:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Black Mesa . -autoconfig didn't work for me... i have windows 10. Can someone help???

item.title: Black Mesa crashes after lauching
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Always post you system specs for the devs and other when asking questions.

The fix for W10 is;

Enable Borderless Fullscreen Mode

Go to Black Mesa’s “Properties” and then “Set launch options.”
Enter “-window -noborder”.

Read full topic
